comments: This class basically comes down to a final based upon 20 chapters. The problem is the only review on those chapters is the tests that are given weekly. 14 question quizzes that you can not go back and review. Extremely tough final to pass. Extremely tough grader. Marked 20 points off class discussion and followed it up with a "good work" comment

comments: Would NOT take any class with this professor again. If youre taking the online class, he makes you take the final on campus still. Extremely difficult with grading. He marked off 30 points for only doing the 15 sentence min. instead of multiple paragraphs. Out of 50 points. Had a 92% and that one grade dropped it to a 64%. DO NOT RECCOMEND.

comments: I would recommend taking a different professor. Online course is horrible. Absolutely, no direction, online quizzes are very difficult. You cannot email him and ask questions, otherwise you will docked points. There was supposed to be a online prep for the quizzes. But, that never happened. Prof. takes over a month to grade assignments.

stu_tags: TOUGH GRADER  GET READY TO READ  EXTRA CREDIT
comments: Mastos is a solid psych teacher. His lectures are very fast paced so make sure you read the chapters before going to class or else you will be lost. He is decently entertaining during lecture cracking a funny joke here or there. I would recommend him if you are willing to stay on top of the readings. Also make drafts of the essay questions.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (8)  Get ready to read (7)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
stu_tags: TOUGH GRADER  GET READY TO READ
comments: If you don\'t read, you won\'t pass. He grades extremely hard on the exams, as if it is a 5 unit class. I recommend finding a different teacher. He is always at least 5 minutes late to class, very unorganized. We go through new material the day of exams. Be prepared to get yelled at very day for your test scores. I have to take the class over again.

comments: I took this online course over summer session 2015. I did not do very well because of my own issues. The instructions and expectations were clear. The professor address concerns I had through pm and class message. There were 2 discussions, 18 SQC quizzes and 10 IA quizzes; each quiz 14 qstns, 14 mins. Study & turn in work and you should be fine.

comments: This class was extremely difficult. I have never taken an online class, or a class in general that has made me hate the materialteacher. You are given a course outline and expected to refer to that for EVERYTHING. The prof comes off as arrogant even through email. I had a totally bad experience, sucks because this class goes with my major.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (8)  Get ready to read (7)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
stu_tags: TOUGH GRADER  GET READY TO READ
comments: He is a tough grader, the toughest professor I have taken. He lectures over all the material. Took him for psych 9 and I am a psych major. He is clear on what you should have read and will go over the reading if you have questions. What makes him hard and why people dont like him is that he tests your ability to apply the material, not memorize it.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (8)  Get ready to read (7)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
stu_tags: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES  TOUGH GRADER
comments: This course is based almost solely on 14 minute quizzes that include randomized information throughout the chapter in 14 questions each quiz (2 per wk). There are accompanied quizzes based on internet websites he provides and some videos, but takes notes carefully, because you need to memorize the important data, you will be quizzed on it later!

tag_professor: Tough Grader (8)  Get ready to read (7)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Professor Matsos is deff not an easy A, hes challenging..but i love that. He makes all of his lectures really interesting. He\'s pretty dope, rides a cute lil\' motorcycle haha just read the chapters, do the study guides & you\'ll be fine :) Also, I recommend you discuss the essay questions with him, he\'ll tell you exactly what he wants :)

comments: I would never recommend taking this class online!! He let\'s you know from the jump that the class is harder online than in the class, but I feel like he goes out of his way to make his online class unneccessarily hard. You can\'t have a lot of classesalong with this one if you choose the online class. Beware!

tag_professor: Tough Grader (8)  Get ready to read (7)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: I had the online Psych class with this Prof. He is honest and upfront about how hard his class is and you had better believe it. I blew my 4.0 here and ended with a B. VERY TOUGH. He grades very harshly and its not a class you can just study....you have to learn and understand. He is honest with you and responds to emails in a timely manner.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (8)  Get ready to read (7)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Best psych teacher ever. He combines stories into his lectures and always keeps the class entertained. There\'s no homework ever, except to read the chapters. People that gave him a bad score were probably lazy and didn\'t put enough effort.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (8)  Get ready to read (7)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: I would not take this class online. He tells you upfront that he makes the class harder for online students. I have never had a teacher do that and find it unfair. He pretty much has online students pegged as cheaters and tries to find ways to trip you up. I didn\'t let it stop me though and did great in the class. His point of view is distorted.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (8)  Get ready to read (7)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: This class was really easy, all you have to do is pay attention and read your book. The people that are saying he isn\'t a good teacher were probably horrible students and do not know how to take a college class. He explains everything perfectly, helps you if you ask, and holds a very entertaining class. Take his class, I strongly recommend it.

comments: I took his online course and it was awful. Do not take this class if you have any other classes. His 50 hrs a week online is next to impossible, especially if you are taking a hybrid language course and his timed tests and quizzes don\'t give you enough time to even think. He is an awful teacher he needs to retire or just go away.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (8)  Get ready to read (7)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Prof. Mastos is not interested in actually teaching you the material. He is only interested in making the class as hard as possible for you. If you dare even question anything or, for that matter, ask a question, he will dock points off of your grade. He demands that you be online some 50 hours a week, which is ludicrous.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (8)  Get ready to read (7)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Prof. Mastos wants to make your time in Psychology a living hell. I have read each chapter 2 times before a test, and either run out of time or still cant get an A. He doesn\'t help you, and if you even ASK him for something, he will dock you points and be very rude to you. How is this guy still teaching? I am paying his salary, at least respect me.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (8)  Get ready to read (7)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: He\'s not interested in being your friend. He\'s not the most exciting teacher, and isn\'t the easiest greater. He challenges you to actually study for the class. He isn\'t out to get you, his tests are straight from the book, if you fail, it\'s your own fault. He really doesn\'t care who you are. Which is great, there is no bias.
